title: Started working with CTL
summary: I started working with Campus Technologies Limited (CTL), the operators of NIIT Kaduna and NIIT Abuja.
detail: In addition to training students in various IT skills, I would be helping CTL set up a robust software development division.

title: C-Sharp Compiler Implementation of C-Sharp 6 Features
summary: Had my article published on top developer site Code Project.
detail: My previous article had been published "under review." This one was published already reviewed and approved.

title: Quic Web Development Framework - Part 1
summary: Had my article on my Quic Framework published on top developer site Code Project.
detail:
Quic framework is a web development framework that helps you create rich web applications
 with as little HTML, JavaScript and CSS as possible. Quic is an abstraction layer at a higher
 level than HTML. The idea in Quic is very similar to that of Facebook's React; as such,
 one who understands React will find Quic very straightforward.
 Code Project is one of the most renowned developer sites, and having them publish my article,
 Introducing the Quic Web Development Framework - Part 1, was a very big source of pride.
